## Converters.optionalBoolean variable

A [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) to convert an optional `boolean` value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
optionalBoolean: Converter<boolean | undefined, undefined>
```

## Remarks

Values of type `boolean` or strings that match (case-insensitive) `'true'` or `'false'` are converted and returned. Anything else returns [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) with value `undefined`<!-- -->.
